A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The visuals were great. I enjoyed the fight scenes. That's about it. I'm not going to put spoilers in here but I didn't like the direction they went with some of the characters. They could have at least let us know more about Snoke. I like Rey but I still don't know how she can be so proficient in the force without any training. I like Finn but I found his side mission with Rose boring. Disappointed there wasn't more Captain Phasma. Can't really talk about more without adding spoilers so I'll just say I was disappointed with the movie.
